title: Bronze 3 Top & Mid Main LFT
body:
Hey Friends,
I have been playing league on and off for 3 years. I turned Level 30 ages ago but have only just started playing solo queue. My bronze 3 is only coming out from my placements and am going to rank up. I am now looking for a team that can help each other, kind to each other and encourage each other to become better players. I am 17 years old and from Melbourne. My name is Sam :) I hope you will consider my offer. I can also only play on weekends and holidays because I am in VCE so I would just like it to be casual. 
Cheers ;)

replies.body: Add me in game, we recently made a new team if you are interested send me a message in game
